other_tests.findings: Trace bilateral pleural effusions and mild dependent atelectasis of the visualized lung bases; right hepatic lobe elongated; no evidence of hepatic steatosis; heterogeneous enhancement of the liver parenchyma with mild periportal edema and inflammatory stranding of the porta hepatis; common bile duct mildly dilated; fluid collection in the gallbladder fossa compatible with a bile leak; pancreas divisum with normal pancreatic parenchyma; right kidney shows a hemorrhagic or proteinaceous cyst; mildly prominent paraaortic nodes; open surgical wound with subcutaneous edema.
